title: First-time director brings "post-post-colonial" South Africa to Cannes
text:
First-time director brings "post-post-colonial" South Africa to Cannes Wednesday, May 16, 2018 - 01:07
''The Harvesters'' tells the story of Afrikaners, a community that thrived in the apartheid era but now faces an uncertain future. Rough Cut (no reporter narration)
